title: Linked List Cycle
description:
Given the head of a linked list, determine if the linked list has a cycle in it. A cycle exists if some node in the list can be reached again by continuously following the next pointer.

Return true if there is a cycle, false otherwise.

A ListNode class is provided for you.

Example:
  Input: 1 -> 2 -> 3 -> 4 -> 2 (cycle back to node 2)
  Output: true

Example:
  Input: 1 -> 2 (no cycle)
  Output: false

Example:
  Input: 1 (single node, no cycle)
  Output: false
